comments.body: This concerns me - proposal says we aren't going to be deleting pet pods in the first round for "safety first".
Disregard, that was PVCs, and I see yo have it in next commit.
This isn't a normal pet queue, because we sort it. It sounds more like a DeletePetQueue
it's more a custom data structure that's functionally closes to a queue in behavior (we already have a queue and I would've just used that otherwise).
